title: FS: T206 Ty Cobb - bat on - SC150, Factory 30 back
author: Angyale

posts.post_title: FS: T206 Ty Cobb - bat on - SC150, Factory 30 back
posts.post_content:
Ungraded.  No creases or wrinkles.  Corner wear only.  Great color.  Decent centering.  I think it’s at least a solid “3”.  $7,500 obo that is reasonable.
 
Pm or email me to discuss.  References upon request. Thanks for looking.

Angyale
